title: HP combined an all-in-one PC with a 34-inch curved screen and it's glorious
text:
HP combined an all-in-one PC with a 34-inch curved screen and it's glorious 
Published By: Mashable - Today 
We've seen a few all-in-one PCs with gorgeous screens — iMac Retina 5K comes to mind — but HP took it to the next level with its new Env...
